trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox" /> should handle a custom text element.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox" /> 應如何處理自訂文字項目。

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom text element, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> attribute to specify that the element should be treated as a single, unbreakable entity.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的自訂文字項目時，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute>屬性來指定項目應該視為單一、 以實體。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A> properties are set to `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> preserves the boundaries and content of the element when the user edits the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A>屬性會設為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>保留界限和項目的內容，當使用者編輯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: In general, the custom element behaves similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，自訂項目行為類似於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>。

trans-unit.source: The following behavior occurs when you use this class and set both of its properties to `false`:
trans-unit.target: 當您使用這個類別並將其屬性，以兩個設定，會發生下列行為`false`:

trans-unit.source: When a user copies and pastes a part of the content in a custom element, the formatting of the copied text is not preserved.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者複製，並將部分內容貼在自訂項目中時，不保留格式設定的複製的文字。

trans-unit.source: When a user types before or after the content of the custom element, the new content does not acquire the custom element's formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入之前或之後的自訂項目內容時，新的內容不會取得自訂的項目格式的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot insert a line break in the custom element.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法在自訂項目中插入分行符號。

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom element, use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and set `preserveTextElements` to `true` to preserve the custom element and property values when you serialize it to the disk or clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立自訂的項目時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並將`preserveTextElements`至`true`序列化至磁碟或剪貼簿時，保留自訂項目和屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox" /> can merge two adjacent text elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox" /> 是否會合併兩個相鄰的文字項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox" /> is free to merge adjacent custom text elements that have identical property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox" /> 可以自由合併具有相同屬性值的相鄰自訂文字項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A> is `true`, the decision to combine adjacent text elements that have identical property values is left up to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A>是`true`，結合相鄰的文字項目都具有相同的屬性值的決定最多保留<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A> is `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> does not combine two adjacent text elements.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>不能合併兩個相鄰的文字項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text element provides formatting on a character basis, or if the formatting applies to the entire element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示文字項目會以字元為基礎來提供格式化，還是在整個項目上套用格式化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if formatting should apply to the individual characters; <see langword="false" /> if the formatting should apply to the entire element.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式化應套用至個別字元，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果格式化應套用至整個項目，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A> is `true` and the user copies and pastes part of the content of a custom text element, the formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A>是`true`使用者複製和貼上自訂文字項目的內容的一部分，會保留格式。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A> is `false`, the formatting is preserved only if the user copies and pastes all of the content of the custom text element.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A>是`false`，只有當使用者複製和貼上的所有自訂文字項目內容的格式會保留。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。
